attributes.action: paint the Houses of Parliament lime green.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lime green is an often neglected colour in this country. But it is technically the most visible colour on the spectrum and the colour of an important fruit. It is time that Parliament promoted this colour by leading the way and repainted itself lime.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
